Name: Milk Bottle And Monster Girl 2
About the game: 【plot summary】 The Eye of the Void in the holy city of Ephelia still exists, and the monsters continue to wreak havoc. The brave man continues to destroy the monsters and save the girl with the holy relic, the Muco bottle. 【How to play】 There will be 5 monsters in each level. Players control the Moke bottle to avoid monsters and break the target point by clicking the left and right keys or AD keys of the keyboard to clear the level. Press the keyboard P key to open invincibility 【Characters and their stories】 Ioria The 'secret police' directly under the royal city has a strong sense of justice. Gerry The first idol, it is rumored that every concert will draw a 'lucky audience'. There are already 7 'lucky ones', each of whom is silent on the details of the night after a night, and shows a look of horror.
